description: Canuck Pizza Truck is delivering Niagra Falls happiness on six wheels - wood fired pizza brought to you on a 1946 Chevy Stovebolt truck. It's bellisimo! Authentic flavours of Italy and Niagara - true fusion of the best culinary tastes on the planet. Espresso, biscotti, tartufo, Pop Shoppe pop - doesn't get any better. Organic hardwood cut with grapeseed oil fires oven. Fresh dough daily. For the true, north strong and free - well not quite free but affordable and enjoyable. That's AMORE EH?
name: Canuck Pizza Truck
